explains: n. 访问；探视；视察；正式访问

sentences.en: She is seeking more liberal visitation with her daughter.
sentences.cn: 她正在寻求对女儿更自由的探视权。

sentences.en: He was not given any visitation rights by the divorce court.
sentences.cn: 离婚法院没有给予他任何探视权。

sentences.en: House-to-house visitation has been carried on, under the regulations of the General Board of Health.
sentences.cn: 根据卫生委员会的规定，挨家挨户的访问持续进行了下去。
